sentences.sentence_en: A glass of cold water managed to revive her after she felt faint in the heat.

sentences.sentence_en: They hope to revive the local economy by attracting more tourists to the outdoor market.

sentences.sentence_en: The director decided to revive the old play for a modern audience at the theater.

sentences.sentence_en: A weekend spa trip is a perfect way to rejuvenate your body and mind.

sentences.sentence_en: The city spent millions to rejuvenate the historic downtown area with new parks.

sentences.sentence_en: Many people want to resurrect the traditional crafts that are almost forgotten now.

sentences.sentence_en: It can be difficult to rehabilitate your reputation after a scandal on the internet.

sentences.sentence_en: She managed to bounce back from the disappointment and start a new music project.

sentences.sentence_en: Kids often bounce back from minor illnesses much faster than adults do.

sentences.sentence_en: After the defeat, the school team is determined to bounce back in the next game.

sentences.sentence_en: He decided to go to a quiet mountain cabin to recuperate after his surgery.

sentences.sentence_en: I need a long weekend to recuperate from the stress of final exams at school.

sentences.sentence_en: Taking a break from your smartphone can help your mind recuperate from digital fatigue.

sentences.sentence_en: She spent the whole afternoon sleeping to recuperate from her long journey home.

sentences.sentence_en: The doctor advised him to eat healthy food to help his body recuperate faster.

sentences.sentence_en: It takes time for a deep emotional wound to heal completely within a friendship.

sentences.sentence_en: We hope that time will help to heal the divisions within our local community.

sentences.sentence_en: Nature has its own ways to heal itself if we stop polluting the environment.

sentences.sentence_en: The project aims to regenerate the abandoned urban area into a vibrant music district.

sentences.sentence_en: Some lizards have the amazing ability to regenerate their tails after losing them.

sentences.sentence_en: The school garden was designed to help regenerate the local bee population.

sentences.sentence_en: Good sleep helps your brain to regenerate and process information from the day.
